timeline.bodyText: Why did you remove the number?
timeline.author: Frawless

replies.bodyText: The metrics with "kafka_topic_partitions{topic=\"" + TEST_TOPIC_NAME + "\"}" was there, but every time with different number at the end. Is that 7 needed there?
replies.author: im-konge
